name: Borderland Bow Billet
desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star bows.

In terms of the "state" of the many weapons that can be crafted from billets, while their potential has long been contained within the original materials, the exact forms these weapons will ultimately take remain unknown to this day...

customize.name: Borderland Bow Billet
customize.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star bows.

In terms of the "state" of the many weapons that can be crafted from billets, while their potential has long been contained within the original materials, the exact forms these weapons will ultimately take remain unknown to this day...

customize.name: Northlander Bow Billet
customize.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star bows.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

customize.name: Dream Solvent
customize.desc:
An item capable of changing Character Level-Up Materials obtained from memories and trials into whatever form is needed.
People once believed that spirits and memories had some material form. If someone dreamed of heaven before waking up clutching a flower, then that blossom must have been made from such a fantasy. Dream Solvent dissolves that which is obtained from memory and transforms it into some other dream.
Indeed, blows traded with the strong are stepping stones towards becoming stronger yourself.

customize.name: Borderland Bow Billet
customize.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star bows.

In terms of the "state" of the many weapons that can be crafted from billets, while their potential has long been contained within the original materials, the exact forms these weapons will ultimately take remain unknown to this day...

customize.name: Midlander Bow Billet
customize.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star bows.

Philosophers believe that there are four purposes behind earthly things. The purpose of these billets is to become a weapon worthy of accompanying a hero.

customize.name: Dream Solvent
customize.desc:
An item capable of changing Character Level-Up Materials obtained from memories and trials into whatever form is needed.
People once believed that spirits and memories had some material form. If someone dreamed of heaven before waking up clutching a flower, then that blossom must have been made from such a fantasy. Dream Solvent dissolves that which is obtained from memory and transforms it into some other dream.
Indeed, blows traded with the strong are stepping stones towards becoming stronger yourself.

customize.name: Borderland Billet Trove
customize.desc:
A precious strongbox that contains a billet filled with potential. It is capable of changing its shape to fit the wishes of its owner.

Use this item to choose one of the following items:

·Borderland Sword Billet

·Borderland Bow Billet

·Borderland Claymore Billet

·Borderland Catalyst Billet

·Borderland Polearm Billet

customize.name: Chain Breaker
customize.desc: A jade-adorned longbow. The gentle winds always seem to swirl gently about its string. Legends claim that this weapon was made in a far more ancient era by a dragon artisan.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Condessence Crystal
customize.desc: A bright and clear crystal with a core that is both tough and malleable.

customize.name: White Iron Chunk
customize.desc: Skilled hands can make this into something brilliant.
